website_summaries.verdict: Has more to offer in aesthetic appeal than functionality. Choose it if you prioritize looks over lighting ability.
pros: Adjustable base with attractive brass finish
The classic style looks good with contemporary decor
cons: Not ideal if you need bright light, since it only takes bulbs up to 60 watts

customer_reviews.title: Love The Look
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was just perfect for my boho-inspired home office. While I purchased it mostly for its aesthetic, it'll make the perfect reading light. Easy to put together & adjust for such a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Looks Like It Costs Much More!!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was a fantastic deal! It looks as good or better than similar lamps at triple the price! It fits perfectly in my little reading corner. I LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: NancyJB

customer_reviews.title: great for crocheting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp to use to help me crochet at night. My side table lamps were not at the right angle to illuminate my project. This lamp is perfect for that! It is non-obtrusive meaning it does not look funny behind my couch with a table lamp right in front of it. It has a sturdy base so it does not wobble. My only complaint is that the joint of the lamp appears to be plastic so I am not sure how long that will last with multiple movements. I have mine set where I want it and don't move it much so I think mine will last.
customer_reviews.author: J. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Piece of trash, honestly.
customer_reviews.text: Total piece of junk. Broke while I was putting it together. Totally cheap and made of plastic (that's where it broke), won't even stand upright. So disappointing! What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive!
customer_reviews.text: I put this baby together pretty quickly and it seems very well-made, durable, heavy-duty. Bought myself a dimmer and LED dimmer bulb to be able to adjust the lighting in our bedroom. Couldn't be happier and glad I spent the money on this floor lamp. The quality is that of a lamp 3 times the price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M.

customer_reviews.title: Adjusts In All Directions
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were looking for a reading light that took incandescent bulbs as we feel they are much easier on the eyes, and we read quite a lot. This light is nice because it can be adjusted for how close to the book you want it, and the shade can also be adjusted so it shines in a certain direction, and it swivels on the pole also horizontally.
customer_reviews.author: Like Natural

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and style
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this lamp. Like others have said, it looks so stylish and is quite solid and sturdy for the price. A quality floor lamp for $40??? Great deal. The color is great, it's heavy but easily adjustable. I put it together in 5 mins. Works with new eco bulbs too. The one thing I wish was different is that the cord is black. I wish it were clear. But not a deal breaker at all.
customer_reviews.author: claire

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look. But, I’ve had for over a year now and the lamp switch has been an issue since day one. If you bump the lamp it will turn off, or the opposite. The switch is neither a twist nor a flick, it is a combo of the two. I have to twist/rotate/flick about 4 times to just turn the lamp on and the the switch will rotate/ move onto a own and the turn off. I have to repeat the process until I find a good spot that the switch will stay at tha keeps the lamp in. Crappy quality control. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: The lamp is great! It is as in the picture
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is great! It is as in the picture, it is practical and perfect for my room. I totally recommend it, for both the price and the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Oana

customer_reviews.title: Good light but difficult on/off switch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp for my 86 year old mother who needed a light near her chair as she enjoys reading and completing mind stimulating puzzles. It is a very good "light" for these purposes. It is also an attractive lamp - especially attractive with respect to the price. BUT the mechanism for turning the light on and off is not amenable to her frail fingers. It is very difficult, if not impossible at times, for her to operate this switch. Do not buy this lamp if your fingers are frail.
customer_reviews.author: R S

customer_reviews.title: Pieces won’t fit together
customer_reviews.text: As pretty as this is, it doesn’t do me any good if the pieces don’t fit together. This back piece is supposed to screw into the main part of the lamp as a kind of handle, but no matter how hard I try it absolutely does not screw in. It ruins the whole look if this doesn’t work. I’m just hoping they will give me a refund. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Duncan

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for my reading corner and looks beautiful in my ...
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for my reading corner and looks beautiful in my room!!! Such a classic look!! It was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany E Kent

customer_reviews.title: Classic but modern. Beautiful and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this thing is gorgeous! It looks like something from West Elm or Restoration Hardware. Very easy to put together, it is very sophisticated looking, sturdy, and feels very high-quality despite the bargain price. A great addition to a classic but modern home.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful lamp!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a bedside light for reading and almost made the mistake of buying one at a local furniture store for $180.00 plus our 10.5% tax. Found this on Amazon (why don't I look there first ... ??? ) and received it today and already have it in position. Easy to assemble which for me was incredible as I can make almost anything difficult. It is sturdy and looks better than the much more expensive version. Very quick delivery and a great price. Happy, happy.
customer_reviews.author: PB Tucson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and flimsy -- not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is a two year review. The lamp is not hard to assemble but it is a cheapo. I've had issues with it not standing straight pretty much since I received it. Within a year of gentle use, it started becoming wobbly because the joint from the stem came loose (see picture). There is no way to tighten it. Recently the joint of the head fell apart (see picture). There is also no way of re-attaching it too. I waited a long time with customer service on the line and they asked for details and photos, but have not been responsive at all. The lamp will end in the dumpster. While it is cheap, it is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kert

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I spent $55 on this floor lamp, and admittedly it looks more expensive than that -- from afar. Up close, the adjustment knob looks like plastic and feels just as flimsy. Our lamp can only be adjusted so far because the locking mechanism to keep it at a certain height, doesn't entirely work. Not ideal. The base is very heavy and feels sturdy, so at least it probably won't be knocked over. I do really like the gold finish. I wish it were a little taller, but I knew the measurements when I bought it, so that's just personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect reading lamp! Very classy
customer_reviews.text: I love this brass lamp! Though it took awhile to arrive (almost a month), when it came it was easy to assemble in about 10 minutes following the instructions. It did not come with a lightbulb, but takes a regular bulb. It is perfect for a reading light, and is adjustable with the long handle you see pictured. The head of the lamp also swivels so that you can adjust it to your exact specifications. It also comes with felt 'feet' to put on the bottom of the base so that it does not scuff your floors! I would definitely recommend, especially if the company can speed up the shipping time.
customer_reviews.author: kristin ouellette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height for reading; looks great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height for a reading lamp. It's heavy (largely solid metal construction) and looks great. The default photo on this listing shows the lamp at its full height, but it does adjust down. The "head" of the lamp both tilts up and town and rotates, so it's simple to get a good angle for the light. One note: since this is an all-metal assembly is does get quite hot! I strongly recommend making sure that you're purchasing an LED Edison bulb, NOT an incandescent one which was an error I made.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Manufacturing!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this lamp! While it arrived earlier than expected, the threads on the base and shaft were manufactured crookedly, so you aren't able to fully assemble the stand. Not only that, but when we did get the lamp standing upright, w/ half-threaded base pieces, the fixture itself didn't even work. I should have known something was amiss when I read the assembly instructions (replete with typos) and they included stackable sticky padding for evening out the balance of the base itself. Not even worth the savings...guess I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Karianne Muckle

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The threaded part of the posts were at an angle so the lamp could get tightly screwed together and since I bought this for a new place I was moving into it was too late to return it by the time I needed it, but either way cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: Incredible deal!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is really well-made. The base is heavy and the parts fit together well (easy to assemble). The pivoting arm has teeth that lock together so it stays in place and won't slip. It's not solid brass, but neither are other lamps that cost five times as much. I was shocked at the quality of this lamp for the price. It's cheaper than lamps you can get at Walmart or Target, and those are really flimsy and don't look like quality products.This looks like an expensive lamp. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Asha

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's nursery. It is a cute color and design, and it worked well in the space. When I first received it, I was surprised by how short it is, but we made it work. Now, it's been a little under a year since I bought it (and 5 months since she was born, which is when we started using it), and it's already broken. It doesn't work anymore. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Deuces

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Adjustment mechanism teeth worn and lamp won't hold position. Dents in tubing!
customer_reviews.author: C. O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Boom arm reading light
customer_reviews.text: Just what we hoped for. We needed an adjustable reading light for both reading and crafting while sitting on the couch or stationed near a recliner. This lamp meets all those needs. Assembly was straight forward, twisting sections together to assemble the up rise pole. Other than that it was easy enough to manage. The base is weighted providing enough stability to angle the lamp where it is best suited without worry of tipping over.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Almost a return...
customer_reviews.text: This lamp isn't made the best, but it is the only one similar in style that had an actual replaceable bulb instead of a built in LED, which is ridiculous. Why this almost went back wasn't only because of the semi-poor quality, it's not all bad, but its so short!!! The LED lamp that I first purchased was nice and tall, about 60". This lamp way shorter, but I found a solve!!!! As you can see in the pictures, since the lamp is behind a chair, I placed it on a stool. =D So, now it is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Sum

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lamp for task lighting art projects.  Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I received this lamp a couple of days ago, but waited until the weekend to assemble it. It is a lovely lamp and looks great! It will be perfect for task lighting for my art projects. Despite what another reviewer stated, this lamp is metal, not plastic. It is substantial and has a weighted, heavy base. The boom move up and down for height adjustment, and the shade swivels and angles for convenient task lighting at any angle. I had an issue with the switch and Lamps Plus customer service was great in remedying the problem. Thank you Mario for your assistance. I would highly recommend this lamp and also Lamps Plus.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a good light for reading music!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful lamp. It arrived quickly and was easy to assemble. It took me about an hour and would have been even faster if my cat hadn't insisted on helping. I used the sticky balancers to make it steady (old house and uneven floors). I have tried several different types of piano lamps and have not been pleased. But this beauty allows me to direct the light wherever I need it. Great item especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I can find nothing to complain about with this light! I wanted a stylish down light for reading on my sitting room couch at night and it's perfect! Assembly was a breeze, the finish is exactly what I was looking for, it seems stable, and is easily adjustable. The bulb is easy enough to change out if you want brighter or dimmer. I thought the price was great too! All-in-all, it totally met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: riirca37

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Excellence
customer_reviews.text: I had an old pharmacy lamp for almost 50 years and finally had to retire it. I was looking to replace it, but they they seemed ridiculously expensive. I saw this one for about 20% of the others and it seemed to good to be true. I finally broke down and bought it and couldn't be happier. well made, easy to assemble looks very nice. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BShel

customer_reviews.title: Defective product and poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had this lamp just over a year and the housing cracked at the point where it adjusts and the knob broke off so it is no longer usable. The company refused to make good on a defective product. It was just a few weeks past warranty. They obviously couldn't care less customer satisfaction. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: C. Picard

customer_reviews.title: Very nice..
customer_reviews.text: Very nice...looks just like the picture...good value...easy to put together, except you have to use more pressure than you might expect when you put together the part that holds the bulb. Very good value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for next to sofa or arm chair, whereas others I saw at Amazon mostly too big, did not look as if they would extend properly over arm, or were not particularly nice looking. Fits purpose of reading lamp excellently. It'd be nice if bulb-holding part rotated 360 but it does go up and down and side to side.
customer_reviews.author: Allison in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, unhappy with one thing!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this lamp. It is more on the gold side of "brass". Structurally pretty study and I love the ability to adjust the direction of light. I am however very unhappy with how the hood attaches behind the lightbulb. It is very flimsy and will come loose if not moved with care. This then causes the hood to swing around and make the light face the ceiling. I needed the lamp so I am not returning, but would recommend the company address this!
customer_reviews.author: Zowie

customer_reviews.title: Great design, and best of all a toddler could ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fabulous--exceptional style and value at this price. Bought one for a friend and two for my living room. Great design, and best of all a toddler could put them together--installation was that simple! I'm someone who has trouble assembling just about anything, but even I put them together in five-six minutes. Icing on the cake? Each one comes with its own bulb. W.O.W. Good find, Amazon, the best!
customer_reviews.author: mycatsmom

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap, keep shopping
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to adjust the handle, okay fine. The kicker to me is it looks cheap and wish I would have gone with another. Don’t give up hope I bought a similar lamp like this from another vendor and it’s on point! Honestly if I wouldn’t have had the context of comparison I may have given it a little better score. Two star it does work and gives light so it is functional.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp. Warm light bulb near you is why i gave a 3 star :(
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is pretty cool. I just wish it was brighter and it does not angle up any higher than a 45 degree angle so if you place it near a reading chair or a couch, the light bulb and the heat it causes will be PRETTY CLOSE to you so you tend to have a warm light bulb near you. Makes me uneasy but besides that that lamp is cool for now.
customer_reviews.author: Yordana.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a waste of money- cheep parts.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp will not last. I have had this for 2 and a half years. Now it burns out new bulbs and the switch is flimsy. Not what you expect for lamp light life. It must be made with cheep parts. It’s a waste!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lamp - very elegant looking
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome lamp and very elegant looking. The workmanship and sturdiness are very good. This goes pretty well with full-grain leather couches. The height is just perfect to be able to read sitting on a couch. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Santosh Balan

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking product
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is beautiful and exactly as described, however Lamp arrived damaged at the base (small dent.) I'm giving it a 5 star, because it is exactly as described, the customer service was great, they didn't give me a hard time to return the lamp. I could have exchanged it for a second one but I needed a new lamp quickly so I ended up purchasing one at a local store.
customer_reviews.author: Mi2 Bookkeeping LLC

customer_reviews.title: Quality Lamp
customer_reviews.text: The product came easy to assemble. It was a little long for the corner we hoped to put it in, so we just unscrewed the extended arm and it fits perfectly. It's flexible to the space and it's pretty substantial, so I'm not worried about it getting knocked over.
customer_reviews.author: katy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as tall as I expected but still very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 stars if we could do that
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the pictures, it’s got a heavy base and overall serves its purpose. It shipped in a timely fashion and came well packaged. The only thing I don’t like is that the adjustable joint in the middle is made of gold colored plastic. It works, I just don’t know for how long with repeated adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hurst

customer_reviews.title: A lot to be said for buying products like this in a store where you can easily return
customer_reviews.text: The product broke (like snapped in half) while I was tightening it. I could not untighten to fit back in box to return, so I threw it in the trash....Wish I would have kept my money. A lot to be said for buying products like this in a store where you can easily return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a lamp like this and never found anything less than $200. This is just as good in both functionality and looks. The brushed brass is really pretty and came in perfect condition. Assembly was a cinch and it works great. Almost feel I should have paid more for this! Great price! Recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: With the recent difficulty finding a product made by 4 year olds in China that had any quality, or that even worked, I was thrilled to find this little gem. It has excellent fit and finish. Exceptional quality and workmanship. As we are using it for a bedside reading light, we chose to use a 7.5 watt bulb, which is perfect. We found the 15 watt was too bright.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Remove the back piece of the arm to put in corner.
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp. Looks like many similar lamps at higher price points. If you need it to fit in a corner, just remove the back piece of the arm. When you remove that piece, it will look like the Julian Apothecary floor lamp from Ballards that is nearly 3 times the price.
customer_reviews.author: jbb

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for around 6 months now. While it looked a little cheaper than I expected, I still liked it. However, I was trying to adjust the light when the top of the lamp split off. I am not a strong woman and I was definitely not pulling or pushing hard at all. It's very unfortunate considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Mills

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and expensive looking
customer_reviews.text: This was simple to put together and looks much more expensive than it was. I've seen similar pharmacy lamps starting at $100 and going up from there. The bronze gold color is nice and neutral and adds some luxury and pizazz to the room. Also, the arm and head are adjustable so you can get the look you want. The on/off switch is on the head so very easy to access. I'm a fan!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Balsa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Screw threads were damaged when they arrived - cant be assembled properly - wouldn't let me return
customer_reviews.author: TJB

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp! Affordable, too.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice looking floor/reading lamp with a retro look, and a nice antique brass finish. Perfect to place next to a comfy chair and use as a reading lamp. Well-made, sturdy, and much higher quality than I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived, I thought it was so beautiful. The gold finish is stunning and it adjusted correctly. Except the tool within the lamp that turns it off and on was broken. I requested a replacement, but received a refund. So now I'm stuck with a lamp that doesn't work and may need to pay to have it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Medallio Green

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is so charming! It is very high quality, and it has little touches that make me feel like it’s a real antique even though I just took it out of the box and assembled it myself. Love all the little clamps and toggles. It feels like it came from the era of which people now say, “They don’t make things like this anymore.”
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Miles

customer_reviews.title: Chic and High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: IF YOU'RE THINKING ABOUT BUYING THIS LAMP, DO IT! I am so pleased with this lamp. It was easy to assemble and it looks like something you'd buy from a high end home store. As you can see, it is not super tall but I have found it is a perfect height to have beside a chair or sofa. Thinking about buying another go to beside a desk--stay tuned!
customer_reviews.author: wallsm14

customer_reviews.title: Good light for knitting
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of knitting and hand sewing. This is perfect for the area where I do these projects. Also good lighting for reading. Much better than the light that I was using. Easy to put together. Not wobbly at all.
customer_reviews.author: thomas quinn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for reading in bed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lamp for reading in bed. I have a hanging lamp on one side but I didn't want a "matchy-matchy" look. This lamp looks good on the opposite side of the bed. The base is heavy so it won't tip. It took less than10 minutes to assemble and no tools were needed. The price was right. I'm happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Handsome floor lamp, quality gold tone that can be pared with brass. Heavy enough that it’s not tippy & is “pet proof”. Works well with both my antiques & mid-century modern pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unable to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The rods do not screw together properly so I’m unable to get the lamp to stand up. There are not parts on either end that would actually fit together to allow it to be screwed on.
customer_reviews.author: JocEsq

customer_reviews.title: not for narrow spaces
customer_reviews.text: do not try to place this in a small area as the vertical arm is long enough to get in the way. Like that it is on and off with a switch on the head, bright enough and easy to angle bulb shade.
customer_reviews.author: MJB Cape Cod

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: For the price you cannot beat this lamp. It looks nice and way to put together. You can adjust the height of lamp. It is not entirely metal but has weight to it. Would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: DC Careful shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not solidly constructed
customer_reviews.text: The arm was barely attached to the body to begin with, and has now snapped off from the weight of the lamp. Definitely not a solid lamp
customer_reviews.author: andyreuter

customer_reviews.title: broke after a year
customer_reviews.text: This lamp worked well for a while, maybe 6 months, then wouldn't tighten to stay in place. Finally broke at the adjustment arm.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lamp--perfect for reading in a dark corner
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lamp--perfect for reading in a dark corner. Why am I in a dark corner? Well, that's another story... Whatever your story, this lamp deserves attention--it's sturdy and attractive, fitting all kinds of decor. I like that it is a modestly priced alternative to expensive designer furnishings.
customer_reviews.author: LizB

customer_reviews.title: Needs the right use and location
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad to have this pretty lamp. However, the long balancing tail and the narrowly focused light beam limit the locations where it is useful and looks good in my house. That's my fault for buying on impulse rather than planning better. If you have the right place for it, go for it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Love this Light !!!
customer_reviews.text: What other reviewer's said.....very good quality !!! I'm no fan of the On/Off switch {stick type that rotate's } , otherwise I love this thing !!!!! It was extremely well packed. Customer service is excellent as well....There was a small issue with my mailing address & their customer service rep actually called me back as promised.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased with this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamp, high quality, easy to assemble, and I love the adjustability. It is sturdy and screws in tightly to its heavy base. I think it’s a touch shorter than I thought, but I didn’t exactly go and measure anything... It is a perfect height for reading or otherwise in my wingback chair. It is classy and really adds to wherever it is. I like that the bulb can be changed to your preference.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lerch

customer_reviews.title: Good service, product okay.
customer_reviews.text: First switch did not work on lamp so a replacement was sent without me having to return the lamp. Second one seems to work. Still not crazy about the switch as it seems like the weak link for the lamp. Lamp is lovely though.
customer_reviews.author: Heather E.

customer_reviews.title: Simply gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is gorgeous! It arrived well packaged and in perfect condition. It was super easy to assemble and looks absolutely amazing in my piano room. Super happy! Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is beautiful. It arrived safely and assembled in under 10 minutes. The only reason I gave it only stars for stability is because the tightening mechanism on the top bar does not tighten in the position I want it to be in. It is not well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: There were no instructions with my lamp but it was still simple to put together and I like the look of it and the usefulness of the swing arm. It's great for working on crafts or doing paperwork. Pleased with the lamp and think the cost is appropriate for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Rodiek

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: This is the latest edition to my living room. I would say be gentle when assembling. There are some weak spots with the arm. Once assembled it's fine and is a great reading lamp. For the price it looks classy. I like the sleek look and the height.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A really nice affordable lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping! Lamps Plus got this to me in 3 days while the rest pf my Amazon order took 5, which made me very happy! 5 minutes to put it together and voila! A beautiful lamp at a very affordable price. This lamp puts out much more light than i expected so, you do not have to be right under it to see your book. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lamp for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, very sturdy and well made for the price. I use it behind my recliner for reading. It is just tall enough however. The 55.5" height is to the very top of the lamp at its highest position.
customer_reviews.author: Muleears

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have it in a corner of a room that we don't use very often. I can't really speak to the functionality of it (we haven't required its use very much), but it looks great and yes, it worked right out of the box with no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: likenesstomoss

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful lamp easy to assemble, and just what I was looking for. Extra light in my chair while reading. Very easy to adjust where you want the light directed. For the price this is a great buy. Was delivered in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Fleebag

customer_reviews.title: These are nice. Easy to assemble and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. Easy to assemble and beautiful. But they do not extend! If they could extend it would be much easier to adjust them around the room and with other furniture. Because the base is so big, they cannot be placed into a corner where a corner couch piece is.
customer_reviews.author: Honest co.

customer_reviews.title: So nice!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this lamp - looks expensive and is such a nice addition to any room. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bita

customer_reviews.title: A Really Nice Lamp for the Money
customer_reviews.text: We really like this lamp. In a review of past comments, we have found none of those problems with this model. The manufacturer may have fixed those concerns. As suggested by one of the reviewers we did not attach the lower end rod so that it fit closer to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Brer Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with the awesome lamp
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp! It's solid, sturdy and so nice looking. I love the industrial, "old" look of this lamp. It was easy to assemble (took me a few minutes) and it was shipped in 2 days. The price is also amazing.
customer_reviews.author: CamVetteGirl

customer_reviews.title: terrible product, does not stay up
customer_reviews.text: I really regret this purchase, it came missing parts and did not assemble correctly. I like the look of the lamp so I have continued to use but it does not stay up on its one, have to use a shelf to hold it up. Should have complained when I first purchased but unfortunately I was hoping to find an easy fix and not time has gone by and the lamp is still terrible. really regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: fancy lamp
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble, nice light for reading, looks perfect and modern in the living room. its sturdy and doesn't move, at least mine is on a carpet but doesn't move an inch. and the package is small enough so I could carry it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my living room
customer_reviews.text: The lamp was shipped quickly. Opened today and put together in 5 min. Looks great in my living room, nice brass, not too gold or shiny. Looks like a lamp you could buy at Restoration Hardware for like 4-5x more than what I paid here. Happy with the quality, very sturdy base.
customer_reviews.author: Stylish SAHM

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute little lamp with a retro look. Feels sturdy. I wasn't expecting much at this price, I just needed a reading light for my living room, but I was pleasantly surprised. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Sims

customer_reviews.title: ... this lamp for my daughter's apartment and it looks wonderful. It looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lamp for my daughter's apartment and it looks wonderful. It looks exactly like the picture. The brass does not look cheap and it has several positions so that you can aim it whatever you want daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Antique standing lamp: easy & stylish
customer_reviews.text: The antique brass standing lamp is perfect for my apt which has no overhead lighting. I rely on lamps in my living room & bedroom. This one is stylish & fits the decor. Also, a good match for the glass tables. Delivery was quick and assembly was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: This lamp functions fairly well, but beware that the joint is plastic, which makes it weak for holding the weight of the lamp's shade. I've kept it and use it often, but had I known about the shoddy design, I wouldn't have bought it. It will eventually break down and become yet another piece of consumer junk.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten M. Drickey

customer_reviews.title: Back is removable so it can fit flush to the wall!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp! So happy with it. Looks very elegant for such a great price! Some people talked about the back being too long but it doesn’t bother me leaving it off. You can’t tell if it’s to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good quality, very bright, brings the room together, interesting piece
customer_reviews.text: The main joint is noticeably a different matierial and color to anyone with an eye for detail. Perhaps sand the seams off before painting it. It LOOKS like plastic but I think it might actually just be a cheaper metal. For a $50 dollar lamp, that joint worries me regarding long term use / how it will hold up over time. Check the photos!
customer_reviews.author: Sean August Horvath

customer_reviews.title: It's heavy and beautiful. Works perfectly over my reading chair
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to order this lamp, as similar ones in retail stores are almost double the price. I was concerned that it would be cheaply made. No need to have worried. It's heavy and beautiful. Works perfectly over my reading chair. I'll likely order a second one. It was well-packaged and quickly assembled. It was also timely delivered.
customer_reviews.author: BldHwaiianofHS

customer_reviews.title: A very nice lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice quality lamp for a really decent price. .It was a nice upgrade for my teen's room, he loves that it shines over his bed for reading and then can rotate to go over his desk.
customer_reviews.author: elbelle

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this lamp for reading. It looks really nice in our living room. My mother-in-law loved it so much, we are getting her this same one for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Takle

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Affordable Pharmacy Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp for the price! The base is heavy so the lamp is not tipsy. The finish is as depicted. The arm locks nicely into place one you adjust it at the level you prefer. Sure, the arm extends out a bit, but I put it next to a chair that sits in the corner of my bedroom and had no issues with it hitting the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Little Bit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Lamp works well and looks high quality! Perfect for my nursery, I ended up taking a piece off because it didn't fit in the space with it on. Happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Merrell

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: looks good works good. looks like something you can buy from target. not real metal just painted to look like bronze and you can tell. but it still looks ok for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fudge

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp, looks great
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is metal and plastic and the plastic is not very sturdy (plastic at the bend) The stability is great as the base is pretty heavy, don't move it around too much and you should be fine, it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Yi

customer_reviews.title: Super cute.
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like shown. Just wish it was maybe 6" taller. the bulb that comes with it is also bright white so I swiched that out for one with a warm glow.
customer_reviews.author: Cathryn

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lamp for my reading corner ! Great price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Margherita  McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lamp for our boat to compliment the wood and brass of the interior and to look like an old chart light and it met all my intentions. Packaged well and simple to put together. Took me about 5 mins. I like how adjustable it is too. Very affordable and good quality. Have only had it a month so I can’t speak yet to it’s longivity at this point.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: is the perfect reading height
customer_reviews.text: A little obsessed with this lamp! Our living room has a ceiling fan with no light and at night time it left one half of the living room quite dark. This helps light up that corner, is the perfect reading height, and looks flipping awesome. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: heatherfeather

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks great in the corner of my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Amber

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous and look more expensive than the price tag. Ordered 2. Easy to put together. Love the various adjustable heights and angles. Great lights. Modernized decor a synch!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cefalu

product_meta.title: Dawson Modern Pharmacy Floor Lamp Antique Brass Adjustable Boom Arm and Head for Living Room Reading Bedroom Office - 360 Lighting
feature_bullets: Adjustable from 33" to 55" high. Base is 10" wide x 1" high. Dome lamp head is 5 3/4" wide x 3 1/2" high. Weighs 9 lbs.
Boom arm is 20" from pole including light. Counterweight balance arm is 14".
Uses one maximum 60 watt standard-medium base bulb (not included). On-off rotary switch on the socket. 5-foot long black cord.
Classic tall pharmacy floor lamp design from the 360 Lighting brand.
Antique brass finish, metal construction, adjustable boom arm and lamp head. 5-foot long cord.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars719 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
